With Lamine Yamal in spectacular form and Madrid dealing with injury concerns, is this Barça\'s chance to reclaim supremacy?',imageUrl:'/clasico-preview.jpg',author:'Carlos Martínez',date:'2 hours ago',tag:'Match Preview'};const HeroBanner=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-banner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-image",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:featuredArticle.imageUrl||'/placeholder-wide.jpg',alt:featuredArticle.title,className:"main-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-overlay"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"article-meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"article-tag",children:featuredArticle.tag}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"article-date",children:featuredArticle.date})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"article-title",children:featuredArticle.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"article-summary",children:featuredArticle.summary}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"article-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"author-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"by",children:"By"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"author-name",children:featuredArticle.author})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/article/${featuredArticle.id}`,className:"read-more-btn",children:"Read Full Article"})]})]})]});};export default HeroBanner;
